articles.title: Trump heads to Detroit to give a speech refocusing on the American economy - NPR
articles.description: The speech at the Detroit Economic Club comes after major foreign policy moves have overshadowed domestic policy.
articles.content:
President Trump heads to Michigan Tuesday hoping to refocus attention on the economy as his party faces headwinds with voters heading into the November midterm elections.
He will be speaking at the … [+1790 chars]

articles.author: Sophie Gardner
articles.title: RFK Jr.’s theories about vaccines are about to be tested - Politico
articles.description: American kids are no longer routinely being recommended shots against hepatitis A, meningitis, rotavirus and the flu.
articles.content:
Most public health experts say theres no evidence to support Kennedys concerns but theyre certain vaccinating less is going to lead to more disease.
Half of my pediatric ward would be kids with rota… [+9635 chars]
